T02TD2409E:31b-1: tsanda l'i ka bindu pra spha ra nam n'a ma /
T02TD2409E:31b-3: gtum mo'i thig le bkram pa zhes bya ba /
T02TD2409E:32a-2: lus ni grub zhi 'od ma gang tshad //
T02TD2409E:32a-3: 'khor lo bzhi ni rang bzhin gnas //
T02TD2409E:32a-4: rlung ni gnyis te 'khor lo drug / rlung gi de nyid yang dag ni //
T02TD2409E:32a-5: brtan dang g-yo ba'i rtsol ba dgag / rlung gi de nyid bsgoms nas ni //
T02TD2409E:32a-6: me chu sa yi de nyid shes //
T02TD2409E:32a-7: rtsa gsum gru gsum rang bzhin te //
T02TD2409E:32a-8: phyi rol ma yin nang yin no //
T02TD2409E:32a-9: srog gi rtsa nas yab kyi ngos //
T02TD2409E:32a-10: sor bzhi gnas su de gnas de //
T02TD2409E:32a-11: thig le dang ldan yi ge aam //
T02TD2409E:32a-12: lte ba ye shes 'khor lo yin //
T02TD2409E:32a-13: sbrul pa'i gnas su bsgom bya ste //
T02TD2409E:32a-14: de steng sor ni bcu gnyis la //
T02TD2409E:32a-15: chos kyi rang bzhin brgyad du ni //
T02TD2409E:32a-16: rigs bzhi yum bzhi sa bon gyi //
T02TD2409E:32a-17: rlung dang me dang chu ru gnas //
T02TD2409E:32a-18: de steng longs spyod bcu drug ni //
T02TD2409E:32a-19: me long ye shes yi ge aam //
T02TD2409E:32a-20: gsal la shel ltar bsgom par bya //
T02TD2409E:32a-21: bde chen 'khor lo'i gnas su ni //
T02TD2409E:32a-22: aa phreng gnyis ldan yi ge ham //
T02TD2409E:32a-23: de ltar shes pa'i lus gnas ni //
T02TD2409E:32a-24: bde ba chen po'i yul zhes bya //
T02TD2409E:32a-25: lte ba'i ram yig yam rlung gis //
T02TD2409E:32a-27: g-yo ba'i ye shes rlung yin te //
T02TD2409E:32a-28: brten pa'i mtshan nyid ye shes me //
T02TD2409E:32a-29: aam bcas dbus su 'bar na ni //
T02TD2409E:32a-30: sdug bsngal dug lnga'i nad rnams dag / bdag nyid stong pa'i mnyam nyid lha //
T02TD2409E:32a-32: bde chen gnas nas chos dbyings 'bar //
T02TD2409E:32a-33: sems kyi bde ba cher skyes na //
T02TD2409E:32a-35: thig le 'thor nas dgram par bya //
T02TD2409E:32a-36: sems nyid snying gar bstims nas bsgom //
T02TD2409E:32a-37: gtum mo thig le bkram pa zhes bya ba slob dpon lu tsi kis mdzad pa rdzogs so//
